ShortAbstract: This is a companion booklet to ‘Dependent Origination’ by the same author.
AddInfo:
This is the second of two booklets in a series by Bhikkhu Brahmali.
Part 1 is: Dependent Origination

DEPENDENT LIBERATION:
(lokuttara-paticcasamuppada)

suffering (dukkha) ›
faith/confidence (saddhā) ›
gladness (pāmojja) ›
joy (pīti) ›
tranquillity (passaddhi) ›
happiness (sukha) ›
unification of mind (samādhi) ›
knowledge and vision according to reality (yathā-bhūta-ñāṇa-dassana) ›
repulsion (nibbidā) ›
dispassion (virāga) ›
liberation (vimutti) ›
knowledge that you are liberated (khaye ñāṇaṁ)
Copyright: Transcribed from a talk by Ajahn Brahmali, Dhammaloka, 23 March 2012.
